ref: 13596 sēvi -- , sēva -- , sēvita -- n. ʻ fruit of Zizyphus jujuba, apple ʼ lex. [← Ir., cf. Pahl. sēb or sēp(?), Māzandarānī sē (Pers. sēb ʻ apple ʼ → P. H. seb m., Or. seba, G. seb, sep n.): poss. associated by pop. etym. with sēvita- ʻ cultivated ʼ, cf. sēvayati ʻ tends (plants) ʼ Bhartr̥.]
P. se f. ʻ apple ʼ, (Salt Range) ʻ fruit of Prosopis spicigera ʼ;
M. śev (obl. śevī) f. ʻ name of a fruit tree ʼ, n. ʻ its fruit ʼ; --
P. seū ber m. ʻ a grafted Z. jujuba ʼ, seuṇ f.
